name: Underground (itch) (blstrManx)
description:
This was the groundworks for the movement and combat mechanics of a metroidvania style game that I began work on over the summer. This was my first attempt at platforming melee combat and I think it went quite well. I also got good art practice while working on this. We've got save points, menus, jump-through platforms, ledge climbing, melee combat, ranged combat, rolling, and lock on. I know this project is rather ambitious, so it’s on the backburner for now, but I'd really love to get back to it.

Controls: 

WASD: Movement

Space: Jump

J: Melee Attack

K: Ranged Attack

E: Interact
